AstroObjectEntry.Entry:
FUNNYSYSTEM funnysystem
FUNNYSYSTEM_CUR true
FUNNYSYSTEM_BEGIN Traces of Other Nomai Traces of ancient Nomai signals have been picked up coming from a nearby group of solar systems a few lightyears away. Your ship has been provided with the coordinates, so you should be able to warp straight there. *NOTE: UPON WARPING, EXIT THE SHIP AND LOOK FOR THE NOMAI RECORDER!!!*
